website_summaries.verdict: Soft lining makes this canopy a better choice for colder days.
pros: Attaches to carseat handle instead of stretching over entire seat
cons: Wind can easily blow flaps open

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw people using carseat canopies, I thought they were kind of silly -- why not just see some loops onto a less expensive blanket? -- but I have to say this canopy has been great. It fits perfectly on our Chicco KeyFit 30, is heavy enough to more or less stay put, looks nice, and the opening in the front makes it easy to check on the baby without waking him up. This keeps strangers from getting in his face, and also helps him stay asleep when he falls asleep in the car. Useful little blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Multiple shortcomings. No longer use.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this canopy multiple times with Chicco Keyfit30 car seat in various weather conditions. This product has multiple shortcomings: 1) with the slightest of wind, canopy flips up from the back and becomes useless and difficult to constantly readjust; weight would help a bit; 2) the Velcro straps fall to the sides of the car seat handle causing the canopy to sag; 3) the “minky” interior material is not breathable, and on warm days causes my daughter to overheat. I have yet to wash the canopy to see how durable this canopy is but worry based on other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: KMo

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this... I bought in the large size and it's "snug" for my car seat. nonetheless, it's perfect for what I needed it. It keeps wind out of my baby's face. I tuck in the edges so that the wind doesn't blow it open. PERFECT! can't believe I didn't buy sooner. I used to use blankets to cover up my baby... not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: KLove

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, idea and customer service
customer_reviews.text: There was an issue with my original item and they took care of the problem instantly! Wow, they have amazing customer service. The product is great, love the fact you can button up the front middle portion to either completely close or like I do and sometimes leave the very top button unbottened so that I can see my baby... the inside is very soft. It is not extremely thick not extremely light so it could be used in either type of climates. If it’s too cold of course just have another blanket inside with the baby. You don’t want to over cover your baby and get them sweaty and uncomfortable. Babies can sweat very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Fine For Indoor Use, Useless If There Is Any Wind
customer_reviews.text: At least with our Chico KeyFit 30 Car seat, this only works ok. If there is even the slightest bit of wind it blows off the seat or into the babies face. It is handy if you have the baby in a store or public place where you want to let the baby sleep, but that's about it. Once the cover gets blown somewhere it is such a pain to fix, If you plan to use this outdoors you'll spend most of your time adjusting it to keep light out, or pulling it away from the babies face.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great covers!
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, provides warmth to baby on chilly days, and front snaps allows you to peek in on baby without lifting cover. In addition, you can feed baby through opened snap area. The fabric is soft, washes well, folds over top of car seat, and provides enough darkness for baby to sleep. Love the hot pink and lime green colors. Adds a pop of color to their car seats. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. I live in Texas and we don't really get too cold down here. I got it to use in Fall and winter, maybe early spring. It's warm enough for 40degree weather if baby has on a blanket under. Cool enough for 70's. Love the opening in the front, one of the main reasons I got this cover. Only thing I don't like is I wish it was a little longer on the sides. But with a little adjusting I'm able to make sure the sides are covered. This only matters when it's cold or windy.
customer_reviews.author: blunion05

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Little ones carseat is a MaxiCosi air and it doesnt cover it all the way which allows cold air to go inside carseat which defeats the purpose of it. Smaller then it seems. Used it a couple times and then just took it off cause i was better of covering carseta with one of his oversized blankets. Also before using i obviously washed it and it lost the texture and cool look it hd when i first opened it. The corners got all curled up and the double side feature is just really out there now. I tried ironing it down but nope, no help.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Deniz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected! Cute style, plush on one side, but doesn’t stay down in wind.
customer_reviews.text: Soft plush on one side and keeps the rain out on the other side. It’s has such cute colors and style and I like that it has the button up so I can peek in on baby. Only down side, as these always have, is that it doesn’t stay in place with wind and the baby always ends up getting uncovered. Really wish there was some style like this with an option to clip on car seat, without being the super hot type that are meant for snowy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome canopy
customer_reviews.text: This canopy fits our infant carseat perfectly! It covers past the bottom of the seat (where babies feet are). I love that we can keep it buttoned up or not and that we have the option as to how much or how little we want to keep covered. It's much easier with this than using a blanket like we were before purchasing this item!
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat canopy you can find !
customer_reviews.text: I received a car seat cover of a different brand and the quality was not what I was wanting. I found this item on Amazon and I have been impressed with everything of this brand. I have sheets , diaper bag, and now the car seat cover. The cover is very durable and is the perfect size for my infants car seat. I also like the quality of the fabric. Both the fabric side and Minky side seem very high quality for the price. I prefer these type of car seat covers that have the slits where you can keep an eye on your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk, misshapen, and badly wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: This canopy's barely serviceable. It fell short of my expectation because of three things. Upon arrival and before first use, I machine washed the canopy and tumble dried it with low heat, then I found it 1) SHRUNK 2) MISSHAPEN at the edges and 3) WRINKLED. It wrinkled to the level that if I don't iron and use it, I would feel embarrassed. That said, I unfortunately will need to buy another canopy :(
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone who had just had a baby. I loved the pattern and that it was gender neutral. She loved the quality of it and how easy it was to use. It fits over the car seat just fine and she was happy about the size and that it covered the seat. The buttons make it easy to cover up the seat or leave it a little opened if you are inside and the baby is sleeping. It also doubles as a nursing blanket when you are in public. Based on her joy, I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: kaytteedel

customer_reviews.title: I like how easy it is to put on and take ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to put on and take off. It is long enough to cover from the front to the back of a car seat. I ordered this as a gift for grandson, the only complaint is we wished the sides of the cover would be an 1 or 2 longer. Other, than that it is a great product and I would order again if needed. Plus I had the product within a few days- fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1 Carseat Canopy and Nursing Cover Up with Peekaboo Opening
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter-in-law for our new grandson's car seat/baby carrier. She uses it every time she goes somewhere with the baby in the car, etc., and also uses when nursing him in public. It's lightweight and washes up very well. She likes this canopy cover very much.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh... Not awful but would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pink and grey chevron, the outer fabric (grey and white chevron) is too thin you can see the pink from the fabric beneath come though, and it’s so thin the grey looks blue-ish. Also it could be a bit longer in the front, it barely covers my kids feet and she’s a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Nance M.

customer_reviews.title: Good wind blocker and people blocker
customer_reviews.text: A must have for the car seat, I keep it over the baby in the grocery store to keep people from approaching/touching new baby. Also feels nice to have a wind barrier when going in and out of places. I keep the gray minky side out, drapes nicely that way, washes easy. Could also be a blanket in a pinch
customer_reviews.author: Leah Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Love the material and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I love the soft material inside! I was able to wash it at home, even though it says dry clean on the tag. Just wash in cold water and let air dry. The buttons were very hard to fasten when I ordered it the first time, probably a defected one, so I contacted customer service and they sent me a new one right away and the new one was perfect! The buttons are easy to open and close and looks great on the car seat. Perfect cover from all the dust, rain, wind, when carrying the infant seat or especially when she's sleeping! Love how you can peek through to check on her too!
customer_reviews.author: Mom1_Elite

customer_reviews.title: High quality car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: Was not excepting to receive something with such high quality material. We love our cover. Our baby was born on a record breaking cold day in Chicago -50 degree weather so we were glad to be able to keep him warm with this cover under a blanket. The design is very attractive as well. Doubling as a nursing cover is an awesome bonus
customer_reviews.author: Decker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is easy to use and simple but works great!!! It’s kinda thick for cold temps and blocking out sound and light. I love the little snap opening in the front allows me to open it and see him but also keep him somewhat covered still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover28

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Although the fabric is very soft and light weight, it doesnt cover the carrier correctly. It's so lightweight that the smallest gust of wind flips it open which makes it completely pointless. I wish I hadnt wasted my money on this carrier cover and would have gotten the stretch kind or the heavier type.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item! I got tired of using my babies’ receiving blanket to throw over top of his car seat. It would just blow off on windy days because it was so light. This canopy is thick but not to thick, stays in place and keeps the light out his face. It’s pretty to the eye as well. Im definitely gonna order a few more! This is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Carseat Canopies!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many carseat canopies, I decided on these. I bought a pink one for my niece and a blue one for my grandson. I was very impressed with the quality and liked the fact that the opening in the front came with snaps and not velcro. After they were delivered, I got an email from the company wanting to make sure I was pleased with my purchase. I was very impressed with their customer service, and would definitely buy from them once again.
customer_reviews.author: jacalyn

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat canopy & nursing cover!
customer_reviews.text: I got this canopy specifically for covering my daughter's carseat. But I couldn't find my usual nursing cover on an outing so I did have to use it for that also. It's great for both. Keeps too much wind & sun off of her but doesn't make her too hot like our last cover did. I keep it attached to my daughter's carseat so I never have to remember to pack my nursing cover again. It's always with us. Great product & I would definitely recommend it to any expectant mothers or women who are already mothers just looking for a little more convenience when out & about with your little ones. 5 out of 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Wynike Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Very hot
customer_reviews.text: Its underlined with fleece. Its pretty hot and thick. I wanted mine for late summer and fall (only) but its so thick, I threw it out and buying a more breathable one. Update: I received an email notifying they are processing a refund. I didn’t request nor expect one; that was nice of them.
customer_reviews.author: k799

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around
customer_reviews.text: Kids N' Such does a great job making sure that you are completely satisfied. I received an email making sure that I was happy with my purchase, you don't see that very often. I love the anchor pattern and the quality of the carrier cover is excellent The packaging was perfect and shipping speed was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Turney

customer_reviews.title: I love the pattern and that it is gender neutral incase ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern and that it is gender neutral incase we decide to have baby number two. I have used it as a nursing cover and it worked great. It does blow over when there is wind, I want to add some velcro on the corners so I can velcro it down when it is windy. Other than that I have been super happy with it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat cover! Bought it for a winter baby and continue to use it to keep the pollen away from our child when running between the house in the car. I like the snap front as an easy way to see the baby
customer_reviews.author: AngelaS

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love how quick and easy this was to put on the car seat handle. The inside is soft and warm and the outside is almost a water wicking material. It has closures that you can close up, leave it open to have a little crack to see in or one flap up, one flap down. It really was one of my best purchases for going out.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with purchase just a few things to note when buying
customer_reviews.text: I have a chicco keyfit car seat and the length fits great but it isn’t wide enough. Also when putting down the main top handle to click, it’s hard bc of the placement but not terrible, which is something they can’t control but should be noted for buyers. I really like the quality of the product and do not regret my purchase at all but I would agree with previous reviews that it’s not as thick as I would of hoped but over all it’s a great product and am happy with my purchase :) and your getting exactly what’s in the picture which means a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: I have researched carseat covers and this one fit our needs the best. It is made well and I received an ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product! I have researched carseat covers and this one fit our needs the best. It is made well and I received an email upon purchase and a week later to make sure I was happy with my purchase. Excellent customer service and that is something to be desired these days! Highly recommend and will tell all my momma friends about this! Excited to put it to use in the next few weeks when the little guy arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!!!! It fits my Graco car seat perfectly and it is perfect for all sorts of weather. Only complaint is that the blue is a little darker than in the picture. But other than that I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for a car seat canopy that was breathable, but would protect the baby good when it was raining or snowing. I am so happy I bought this one! I love the color and it was at a good price compared to the others that I was looking at that were double the price from this one. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: S1000r junkie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad product, however I bought this thinking it would keep my son a little warmer and this was not the case. The sides are too short and leaves an opening on each side for wind and cold air to get through.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Was okay for some coverage
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover is great for the summer, the only issues we had were the sides would hang so sometimes the light would get in on the side while he was in the car and would wake him up, or if we didnt keep the canopy up it would fall down from the back into his face. It is soft and makes it easy to check on him real quick though while in his car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Moore

customer_reviews.title: Short on sides
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with this canopy. My only critique would be that the sides are a little short and so some sunlight peeks through and with a newborn in Florida it is a little bothersome as it'll shine right in his face. Once he gets bigger though this won't be a problem as it'll just shine on his belly.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product I loved the color and the pattern! I wouldn't recommend if you live somewhere windy as it tends to blow up when the wind hits it. It also tends to slide down the car seat handles but it's no big deal. It's a good nursing cover too but I don't really use it as a nursing cover cause I like to be able to see my baby while im breastfeeding and it's just too closed off.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great cover in rain
customer_reviews.text: Great carseat cover for wet, cold weather. Haven't used it at a nursing cover yet. Gets warm, but easy to open front so baby isn't hot.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to durability until I take it out in the rain and wash it, but it's great for sun blockage and nursing. It's very soft too! If it does well against rain and comes out well after washing, it'll be a perfect little trinket for mom and baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother in Croatia. Didn’t know if it would fit for the car seats over there because it’s a different country but he showed me a picture and it works for any kind of car seat. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Rey

customer_reviews.title: Versatile car seat cover many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for covering the entire car seat and great for a coverup for breastfeeding in public. So Soft on one side that you could use as a blanket or changing pad if in a punch. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: M McKellips

customer_reviews.title: Great but color is off...had to return
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was more accurate to the color in the pictures. The inside of the dark blue one was more pale and a beautiful color. I would have kept it even though it was not dark blue, however, the reason I returned the item was because the chevron pattern was not really grey, it was more of a faded blue (almost like the blue on the other side was affecting the color it was suppose to be: grey and white).
customer_reviews.author: SakuraJess

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. I’m not giving 5 stars because they sent ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits the Chicco keyfit30 shines in decent time. Quality is good. I’m not giving 5 stars because they sent the wrong color. Disappointed in that. I ordered the grey and navy they send all grey. I would prefer it to be a bit bigger. It didn’t cover as much shown in pic but it still covers just enough to do what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The Best !
customer_reviews.text: this carseat just came in and so far its so beautiful and Sooo Soft ! i seen some mixed reviews but in my opinion its so nice and worth it ! the type of carseat i have is the " Graco SnugRide Infant Carseat - 35 Lite LX " from Target . The color goes well with my carseat head support and strap set from target . i havent washed it yet so idk how it will be after wash . packaging was great and delivery took about a week .
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality especially for the price. I usually make one for baby gifts but I was down with a hip replacement and decided to try this one. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: TONYA

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely LOVE this carseat cover
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this carseat cover! Fantastic workmanship and great quality fabrics. The minky fabric is so soft, it's wonderful for baby! The peek a boo zipper is a bonus to be able to check on baby without having to totally uncover them. Seller even emailed helpful tips on washing and using the cover! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: S. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting just a regular cover for the car seat but it’s even better. Not only does it fit the car seat well, do the job of covering but it’s also super soft and can be used to help with nursing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Heavy wind, won’t stay on car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and super soft. But if you are out and about on a windy day might as wel not even use the cover. Blows off the car seat easily. Doesn’t really cover the whole seat. Slips and slides to one side. I ended up returning mine and going with a streatchy one. Wish it would’ve worked
customer_reviews.author: Ch3ymb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just received this yesterday so haven’t actually used it yet out in the weather Will update review once used, however is super cute, soft, covers whole car seat, buttons easily snap and unsnap, will keep out more sunlight
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon porter

customer_reviews.title: Practical design but needs improvement on quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was good for almost 2 months. But after a while, the middle got ripped after washing it. I follow the washing instructions all the time and I wash it 2x or 3x a month but it seems like the quality is not that good. However, It's the best design compared to all the car seat canopy/covers I've seen and bought but I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I lost count how many different car seat covers we tried and this was the easiest to set up and take baby in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The one I got doesn’t completely cover both my car seats which sucks cause it’s starting to get cold but overall cute.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Worth the buck.
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Works great for blocking sun, keeping wind off baby, or just simply privacy. Fits car seat perfect, and such a cute cover.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Wood

customer_reviews.title: It’s best for summer, so so on the winter u need to be carefully
customer_reviews.text: This is for summer use only, really can’t work on winter, if use it then make sure cover all side alone with using blanket as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fari

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product except for 2 flaws. 1) Depending on the height of your car seat handle, the sides of these covers might not completely drape to the side of the seat, leaving a small gap. We have a Chico KeyFit30, and the fabric barely overlaps the edge of the seat. 2) If the wind blows even slightly, expect the cover to lift or even fold over the top of the car seat. In cold weather with a slight breeze, this is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Young Professional

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a pain....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this and it worked for a while but now it is kind of a pain. This is good for a small car seat- maybe mine is just a big Graco one but I find myself always adjusting it because the flaps keep moving inward and covering the baby instead of draping over the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Pauly

customer_reviews.title: This makes a great gift for new moms
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for me (Grandma), ended up ordering two more for my new grandchildren. This would make an awesome baby shower gift!!
customer_reviews.author: jc7926

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister’s newborn, and she absolutely loves it. It’s super soft and looks so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Berlycsr

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the product. The snaps make it easy to see baby. However I was expecting a much thicker material when I read it had minki fabric. We live where it snows alot and have minths that are colder than 32°c.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a family member that has twins. they really like them and use them all the time. I like the option to open the front.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to cover my little preemie baby from the sun and from people touching him since he's so vulnerable right now. The first cover I received had a piece of material missing so I requested an exchange and they didn't make me return the defective one. They quickly sent out a new one to me at no charge. Great customer service and the second cover came in perfect. Very happy over all.
customer_reviews.author: HannahW

customer_reviews.title: Buy the large
customer_reviews.text: i bought the regular thinking it would fit my car seat and it did not. The owner sent me a large and was so pleasant to deal with. The large is just right. I like that I forgot my diaper bag for a Drs appt and was freaking out about having to nurse in public and realized that I could use this cover in a pinch!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ishy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Don't look any further, that's the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love how I can use it for several options: as a blanket, as breast-feeding cover, and as car seat canopy. Soft side is very fuzzy and warm ( it becomes handy at the doctor's office where you have to undress your infant). The company behind it has great customer service values. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Liina

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable, just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Not too big or too small! I may be able to use as a nursing cover, but that isn’t what I bought it for. I washed it first thing to make sure there were no germs. Just in case, I’d recommend drying it by itself to make sure it doesn’t get damaged. I love it! It’s rainy today so I’ll be testing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Tumbaridis

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time! Great car seat cover. My little one seems comfortable and stays warm. I have a winter baby and this was a great buy to keep my newborn warm and comfortable. Completely covers car seat and I have easy access to see baby! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shantavia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very excited with my order! I work at a pediatric clinic and see many baby car seats with a cover like this one, I knew i had to purchase one, makes it a lot easier than a regular blanket . Came right on time, seller gives you awesome customer service. Cover is lightweight yet provides great coverage. It Covers my baby car seat well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cover ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It fit my sons car seat perfectly. I love that it has buttons so I can leave open or closed if if I want. It’s even come in handy as an extra blanket when my son was cold. I would definitely recommend this to any new parent for their car seat, if you just need a nursing cover, or just need to grab an extra blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It's so cute and has so many different uses. I needed a nursing cover for breastfeeding but also wanted a car seat cover. I works great for both. However, the main reason I purchased this was to protect my son from strangers that feel it is okay to try and touch my son when we're out in public. It works perfectly because you can have your child completely covered while maintaining a comfortable setting in the car seat
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy THIS Cover
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I live in Portland Oregon and we've been having weather; this cover not only keeps the rain and snow out of my little ones face but also keeps the heat in and the wind out. Also CUSTOMER SEVICE! 5 STARS. If your between a few of these covers and not sure which one to get, GET THIS ONE. This companies customer service is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Not that impressed with the quality of this item. Material felt kind of cheap and wasn't big enough to completely cover the Britax car seat. Also, the buttons were really hard to snap together. When I finally did it, it took all my strength to unsnap them... unfortunately I ended up tearing one of the snaps off (this happened the first day I received the canopy).
customer_reviews.author: edo408

customer_reviews.title: Nice Covering
customer_reviews.text: I used it as the canopy carseat, not for breastfeeding. It is so great. Kept her cool, while she was in her carseat. Easy to wash, i washed it in cold water... although it did come out wrinkly, it wasn't too bad. Mine had a few buttons, one broke off pretty easy. I loved covering her in this, even though strangers still asked to see her.
customer_reviews.author: Lenzi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of it- adorable yet sophisticated & doesn’t take away from the sleek look of the car seat/stroller. Very easy to use and does the job. Was using a blanket before but this was a game changer. Also, my newborn loves the mesh patterns on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Soft cover for baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product but a bit overpriced (hence the ding of 1 star). No other decent competitive product so no choice but to pay for this but we’re still happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: OMAR P.

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: The cover wasn't quite long enough to stay put over my baby's head and kept falling into the car seat and covering her face. Very scary and annoying. There fabric is very soft and it seems to be good quality I like the snap button closure I never tried to use it as a nursing cover so cannot comment on that
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tsu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for, it's so soft you can even use it as a blanket or a nursing cover. Wished I had it for my first child. Love the color too, it matches my car seat perfectly. I was worried that it wouldn't be big enough but it works, just the right size. The front has buttons so u can close it, just not all the way like a zipper, but I think that's even better because then your baby can have some air coming through. Get it! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold
customer_reviews.text: This is nice to keep baby protected from cold and rain but will fly up if there is wind. I would not use it as breastfeeding cover as it if very heavy and doesn’t seem breathable for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The canopy arrived just as expected. Well made and functional. It can attach to a variety of car seats and the front flap design is good for ensuring enough airflow is going to the baby. At first, I received a blue color canopy and requested an exchange for a grey one. The seller was really responsive and sent a replacement right away, along with a prepaid return envelope so that it was super easy for me to return the blue one. I give an A for the product, A+ for the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Immediately

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, just not big enough.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty product. It appears to be well made. It's easily washable. However it isn't wide enough to cover a standard sized carseat. It leaves big gaps on both sides of the carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I don't consider this a necessity but it is nice to have. Inside is nice and dark. Soft to touch.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: inspected item and it looks great. this is a Christmas gift for our great-granddaughter. This is perfect/
customer_reviews.author: Ursula & Joe Fred

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Cute cover not light weight but was what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping baby warm on a cool day.
customer_reviews.text: I wish was a way to anchor the back of the cover. It flew up in the wind. Aside from that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works really great! Easy to put on car carrier and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really great! Easy to put on car carrier and makes it easy to check on my little one. It doesn’t seem as functional (or big enough) to use as a cover for feeding. Love the color and love the feel!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Canopy covers well. Thick enough, soft on the inside, good quality! Works great as a nursing cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight
customer_reviews.text: Soft and lols good but horrible in the wind. They need to add some small amount of weight around the edges so it stays down during wind. Defeats the purpose that it can’t stay down when a breeze comes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L McPheeters

customer_reviews.title: Shrink in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: When you wash it and put it in the dryer, IT WILL SHRINK BIG TIME. I hang it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: It's kind of good, but it would have been much better if ...
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of good, but it would have been much better if this is just a little bit more wider. I like the opening part that can see the baby anytime
customer_reviews.author: Y.S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this cover
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cover. It is super cute, great quality and above all is very functional. Having a newborn during cold and flu season has been challenging and this cover enabled us to go grocery shopping and feel less stressed. The cover is wonderful and I would definitely recommend it to other new moms as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, never use it as a nursing cover. I don’t like to nurse in public personally, but this is an awesome product to cover the car seat. Keeps the baby warm, it’s durable, holds up to lots of washes. It’s soft.
customer_reviews.author: sean keys

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay put
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep the rain off my newborn daughter on walks in her Graco car seat. The cover doesn't stay in place. The loops slip down the side of the handle and the cover blows out of place in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: G.M.

customer_reviews.title: Missing buttons
customer_reviews.text: Just had my baby, and now just noticed it's missing buttons :( emailed seller hoping to get the situation corrected! The fabric does seem nice tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie heaps

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Double-use baby products are always a win. This car seat cover doubles as a nursing cover which I love. It's made of a durable material and is really comfortable. Might get hot if using in hot summer, but I was looking for something a little heavier for our cold winters here. Very cute materials as well! I don't normally leave reviews on products so that just goes to show how much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for keeping out sun and cold wind easy to attach very durable easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this cover is that it has buttons. I can take a quick peek at my baby and we also don’t have to take the whole thing off if not in use, just have to button it at the top. I’ve washed my cover several times and it’s stayed in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't happy that it's small for graco car seat
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't happy that it's small for graco car seat. Covers completely the front, however doesn't cover the sides completely. In a windy day the air gets through the sides. Usable, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Any mom with an infant in flu season needs this. I love that people have to ask me to see my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: the fit is good to cover a britax b-safe infant car seat
customer_reviews.text: First this item was washed, then hang dried it and handled well. Second, the fit is good to cover a britax b-safe infant car seat. The button flap design in the front has been very handy for peaking at baby. Not sure how it will block wind in the winter season because there are gaps from the button closure. But overall a good car cover.
customer_reviews.author: KC ESQ

customer_reviews.title: It does its job..
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of my cover. I also really like the amount of shade it provides my baby. Just sad that it is already fraying after only 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Like the binky lining and snap together opening, however, it would be nice if it Velcroed on the back. This is just enough cover so fat for Indiana late summer fall-not too hot or cold. And,I highly recommend watching the car seat lady (pediatrician) for how to keep baby warm AND save while in carseat.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. Exactly what I expected it. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Iulia Rhodes

product_meta.title: 2 in 1 Carseat Canopy and Nursing Cover Up with Peekaboo Opening | Large Infant Car Seat Canopy for Girl or Boy | Best Baby Shower Gift for Breastfeeding Moms | Chevron Pattern with Hot Pink Minky
feature_bullets: OUR CUSTOMERS SAY our Peekaboo Carseat Canopy covers their baby from mild wind, cool and warm weather, bugs, germs, strangers, and more!

DOES YOUR BABY SLEEP IN THEIR CAR SEAT? Our cute Car Seat Canopies give infants a darker, cozier environment to nap in allowing you to travel around to the store, restaurants, and wherever else you go.

NEVER COMPROMISE YOUR BABY'S SAFETY again by throwing a blanket over their carrier. Our unique Peekaboo Opening snaps AROUND the handle so you can always maintain a firm grip while toting your child from place to place.

NURSING YOUR BABY IN PUBLIC no longer has to be a burden. The Peekaboo Opening gives breastfeeding mothers modest coverage while nursing. Just remove the Car Seat Cover from the car seat and wear it like a bib! Check out the images to see how easy it is.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE- It's not just hype. Read our REAL reviews and see what mothers are saying about Kids N' Such. We are known for having top premium products AND customer service.

specifications.Safety warning: Your child's safety is our top priorty. Do not leave your child covered while they are unattended. Remove the cover before you place a child into a vehicle. Keep the cover and car seat away from any heat source.
specifications.Material free: BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free, Lead Free
specifications.Care instructions: Machine Washable, Air Dry, Dry Clean
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,351 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
